name: Dirty Jobs Simulator
description:
Become a dirty work specialist. Get jobs from the local townspeople and finish them on time. Go to places where no one dares to look.



Time works against you. If you don’t clean up fast enough, the risk of an epidemic in town will rise. Choose the right tools and act quickly and effectively.



Do your tasks in the right order. Evaluate danger that comes with every ‘dirty situation’, make a plan and respond accordingly.



Working with dirt and waste, you always run a risk of catching an infection. Good hygiene and a local nurse will help you to stay healthy.



The faster you work and the more thorough you are, the more people will like you and the more they will pay you. With extra money, you can invest in better equipment, tools and cleaning products.
